report.title: Pleasurable, Clean Stimulation
report.author: naginnudej
report.bodytext: I an experienced researcher who has a particular persuasion for stimulants. My stimulant experience is as follows: amphetamine, dextroamphetamine, methylphenidate, dexmethylpheniate, methylenedioxypryrovalerone (MDPV), MDMA, bk-MDMA, bk-MBDB,among others. /n /n Set/Setting: 4-FA is acquired from trusted source in hopes of finding a new study aid. 150mg measured out on +/-.001mg scale. Allergy test produced no undesirable results. /n /n ..and without further adieu: /n +00:00 150mg dissolved in distilled water and ingested on empty stomach. /n /n +00:35 Delightful nervousness and warmth building in chest. I light on my feet. /n /n +0:45 Getting chatty at this point. /n /n +1:00-4:00 I impressedndeniable entactogenic qualities with smooth stimulation keeps me on my toes. Work is accomplished with gusto and fervor; mixing music with a friend is particularly enjoyable. /n /n +4:15-7:45 Entactogenic qualities have subsided although there is lasting stimulation for the remainder of the experience. Physical discomfort was nearly non-existent. /n /n Conclusion: The subtle empathogenic qualities in conjunction with the clean stimulation really tie together this long-lasting stimulant. Recommended only if your in it for the long haul.
